title: Jason La Canfora on coaching rumors, Achilles heels for playoff teams (Football 12/19)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by CBS Sports NFL Insider Jason La Canfora to break down the latest news and rumors surrounding the Ravens QB and coach situation (2:00), the latest on the Panthers coaching situation (12:00), Mike Shanahan rumors (13:30), who John Elway will hire next (15:00), Steve Wilks hot seat (17:00), Hue Jackson's chances in Cincy (20:00), the Browns interest in Gregg Williams (21:30), what the Redskins will do (25:00) and the Achilles Heel for each potential contender (27:00).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
